Header.title: Level Up
Header.paragraph: A student skills Database to Level up their Skills.

Services.name: Personal Portfolio
Services.text: Using all the details ( education , projects , skills , experience etc. ) which student submit website will create a neat webpage cum portfolio page.

Services.name: Doubt Blogs
Services.text: Users can post doubt blogs and can comment out solutions on the post and will be rewarded point on correct solution.

Services.name: Coding Calender and Questions
Services.text: Website contains upcoming contest calender and question bank cum roadmap for dsa preparation.

Services.name: Project Reviews
Services.text: Profile viewers can provide feedback/ reviews to the projects and student can view all and can resolve them.

Services.name: Leaderboard
Services.text: Using the Competetive Coding platform username website will create leaderboard using rating , number of questions solved.

Services.name: Profile Search using Filters
Services.text: Recruiter can search student using skills , address , email id and view student profiles.
